name: SoftRainSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open soft rain sounds”
”Alexa ask soft rain sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soft rain sounds
des: Delve into the calming embrace of the natural world, and find a peaceful sanctuary easily accessible to you. Let go of daily stress, seek comfort in your meditation, or cultivate a tranquil environment for your professional or academic pursuits. Gentle Rain Melodies serve as an ideal, research-supported aid for achieving deep relaxation, sharpening focus, and promoting restful sleep. Simply activate it by saying, 'Alexa, play Soft Rain Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of harmonious rain sounds. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
